help-file.title: BLUR
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Blur" grants up to one extra hit per round. It can be combined with "Dual Wield" and/or "Double Attack" for added attack possibilities. It does not dispel the "Slowness" spell, but can counter its effects.
